description.value:
Once per day as a standard action, you can shape or warp wooden objects. This functions as either @Compendium[pf1.spells.10e3iwsr5jkq4q73]{Wood Shape} or @Compendium[pf1.spells.mt3gozaeg6qqy180]{Warp Wood}.

At 11th level, you can use this ability to push wood away from you, as @Compendium[pf1.spells.ipc85wy0f0lmr0l4]{Repel Wood}.

At 7th level, and again at 14th level, you can use this ability an additional time per day.
